class.name: AudioStreamMIDI
class.brief_description: An audio stream that plays MIDI files using a SoundFont2 synthesizer.
class.description: [AudioStreamMIDI] is an [AudioStream] implementation that plays Standard MIDI Files (.mid, .midi) synthesized through a [SoundFont2] instrument bank. It supports tempo scaling, global transpose, and looping. To use, assign both a [member soundfont] and a [member midi] resource, then play via an [AudioStreamPlayer] or similar node. The playback instance created is [AudioStreamPlaybackMIDISF2], which provides per-channel controls such as mute, solo, transpose, volume, and program override.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the MIDI will restart from [member loop_offset] when playback reaches the end. Useful for background music.
Time in seconds at which the stream restarts after looping.
The [MIDI] resource containing the Standard MIDI File data to play.
The [SoundFont2] resource used to synthesize the MIDI data. Must be assigned before playback.
Multiplier for the MIDI playback speed. Values greater than [code]1.0[/code] speed up playback, values less than [code]1.0[/code] slow it down. Must be greater than [code]0.0[/code].
Global transpose in octaves applied to all note events during playback. Positive values shift notes up, negative values shift notes down.
